Kate Garry Hudson (Amụrụ n'April 19, 1979) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri na nwanyị ọchụnta ego. Ọ bụ onye natara otuto dị iche iche, gụnyere Golden Globe Award, Critics' Choice Movie Award na Satellite Award, yana nhọpụta maka Academy Award, BAFTA Award, na Screen Actors Guild Awards abụọ.
Hudson mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri Desert Blue nke afọ 1998, nke sochiri ọrụ nkwado na 200 Cigarettes (1999), Dr
T & the Women, na Gossip (Ha abụọ n'afọ 2000)
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na mba ụwa site n'ihe ngosi ya nke Penny Lane na Cameron Crowe's Almost Famous (2000), nke o ritere Golden Globe maka Best Supporting Actress ma nata nhọpụta Oscar n'otu ụdị ahụ.

N'ime afọ 2000, Hudson gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ịhụnanya, dị ka Alex & Emma, How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (ha abụọ 2003), You, Me and Dupree (2006), Fool's Gold, My Best Friend's Girl (Ha abụọ 2008), na Bride Wars (2009)

Ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ ọ na-eme gụnyere The Four Feathers (2002), Raising Helen (2004), The Skeleton Key (2005), Nine (Ha abụọ 2009), The Killer Inside Me (2010), Something Borrowed (2011), The Reluctant Fundamentalist (2013), Rock the Kasbah (2015), Deepwater Horizon, Mother's Day (ha abụọ 2016), Marshall (2017), na Music (2021)
Na telivishọn, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke Cassandra July na usoro ihe nkiri Glee (2012 ruo ụbọchị 13].

Hudson bụ onye guzobere akara ahụike na mmemme ndị otu Fabletics, nke TechStyle Fashion Group na-arụ ọrụ. N'afọ 2016, Hudson wepụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, Pretty Happy: Healthy Ways to Love Your Body
Nke a sochiri n'afọ 2017 site na Pretty Fun: Creating and Celebrating a Lifetime of Tradition
